title: Handle Buyer's Request for Repairs
description: After an inspection, a buyer has submitted a request for the seller to perform several repairs. The agent must present this to the seller.

tasks.description: Receive the inspection report and the buyer's formal request for repairs from the buyer's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the repair request documents.

tasks.description: Summarize the requested repairs for the seller client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, concise summary of what the buyer is asking for.

tasks.description: Advise the seller on their options (agree to all, some, or none of the repairs) and draft a response.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides strategic advice and drafts the seller's response.
